verbs.description: On his [ARGM-LOC: nationally] [V: syndicated] [ARG1: radio talk show] Friday , host Sean Hannity made the case to his listeners that President Donald Trump ’s willingness to walk away from the North Korea Summit is the “ definition of peace through strength ” and embodies the Reagan doctrine .
